DOC.brief_summary: A pharmacokinetic study investigating the rate and extent of absorption of paracetamol and an adjuvant from two different paracetamol formulations.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Compare Two Paracetamol Formulations.
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or female volunteers aged 1855 years with a body mass index ranging from 1928 kilograms per square meter who have given informed consent
